```r
sinspuPCoAMeta %>%
  group_by(sampleloc) %>%
  summarise(sampleloc.Dim1 = mean(Dim1),
            sampleloc.Dim2 = mean(Dim2)) -> samplelocCentroid

ggplot(sinspuPCoAMeta,
       aes(x = Dim1,
           y = Dim2,
           color = sampleloc)) +
  geom_point(size = 2,
             alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_color_manual(name = \Sample location\"
